title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 22.7 - Place of examination
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 22.7 - Place of examination

State Regulations

Except as otherwise provided in this Part, the examination of
applicants for certificates of literacy at local registration shall be
conducted in public school buildings, offices or other places convenient of
access, which shall be designated by the local superintendent of schools. Examinations given by central registration boards shall take place in the
offices of the county board of elections used for central
registration. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
22.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
